pages.text: $(bred)Newspaper Zombie$() is a zombie who loves news very much, $(m)don't ask why he read blank paper$().$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)22$()$(br)$(bred)Paper Health$() : $(l)10$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Little Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : When its newspaper broken, it will be immediately angered, and then increase its speed to $(l)Little Fast$() and damage to $(l)Little Low$().
